Text: can you please tell me how to install this  do i just drag the iso (game) on a blank dvd, put it in my ps2 and start playing or do i have to use a hacked ps2 and use daemon tools
Unpack with winrar then just burn the DVD with ImgBurn at low speed 4x
Pretty sure you need to mod your ps2. Thats where you install a mod chip into the ps2 system. Unless somethings changed over the past 6 years thats the way it was.
